title: Seeds, Seeds, Seeds, Fixing the Sixers, and the Bubble Suns | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the narrowing race for the 8-seed in the West (0:37), the never-ending quest to make the Philadelphia 76ers' roster fit together (28:12), and the still-undefeated Phoenix Suns (45:47).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
